name: Galactic Conquest
overview: A space conquest game for 1 to 6 players by Scott Jensen that was published in 1983 by Victory Software and later released in Digital Marketing PD #107. Command hundreds of star ships as you conquer other worlds and extend your empire. Watch out for black holes, photon storms, stars that go nova and beware General Badguy. 1-6 players. Sold via mail order by Powerdisk in the US and Canada packaged with "Mario's sister Giana, Sanxion, Krazy-Kar and 5 others for just $12".
